member.summary: Evaluates a given request against specified settings for the type of security action required to fulfill the request properly.

The settings to evaluate against.
member.returns: A SecurityType value for the appropriate action.

member.name: M:Ventaur.Web.Security.RequestEvaluator.Evaluate(System.Web.HttpRequest)

member.param: The request to evaluate.

member.name: M:Ventaur.Web.Security.RequestEvaluator.RequestMatchesMode(System.Web.HttpRequest,Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode)
member.summary: Tests the given request to see if it matches the specified mode.
member.param: A HttpRequest to test.
The SecureWebPageMode used in the test.
member.returns:
Returns true if the request matches the mode as follows:
If mode is On.
If mode is set to RemoteOnly and the request is from a computer other than the server.
If mode is set to LocalOnly and the request is from the server.

member.summary: Represents an evaluator for requests that

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode.On
member.summary: Indicates that web page security is on and all requests should be monitored.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode.RemoteOnly
member.summary: Only remote requests are to be monitored.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode.LocalOnly
member.summary: Only local requests are to be monitored.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode.Off
member.summary: Web page security is off and no monitoring should occur.

member.name: T:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecureWebPageMode
member.summary: The different modes supported for the <secureWebPages> configuration section.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecurityWarningBypassMode.AlwaysBypass
member.summary: Always bypass security warnings when switching to an unencrypted page.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecurityWarningBypassMode.BypassWithQueryParam
member.summary: Only bypass security warnings when switching to an unencrypted page if the proper query parameter is present.

member.name: F:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecurityWarningBypassMode.NeverBypass
member.summary: Never bypass security warnings when switching to an unencrypted page.

member.name: T:Ventaur.Web.Security.Configuration.SecurityWarningBypassMode
member.summary: The different modes for bypassing security warnings.

A flag indicating whether or not to ingore the current protocol when determining.
